item.title: Out of the sandbox: developing native Desktop apps
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: We build web apps that runs on browser and server-side apps on Node.JS, but what’s about native Desktop applications? In this talk I will introduce node-webkit: an app runtime based on Chromium + Node.JS, you can use to build Desktop apps with JS and HTML, with no browser’s limitations like file-system calls or running native […]
item.content:encoded: We build web apps that runs on browser and server-side apps on Node.JS, but what’s about native Desktop applications? In this talk I will introduce node-webkit: an app runtime based on Chromium + Node.JS, you can use to build Desktop apps with JS and HTML, with no browser’s limitations like file-system calls or running native code.
